h1: How Many Calories in a Chicken Chipotle Bowl?
assumptions: Chipotle-style burrito bowl: grilled chicken, brown rice, black beans, fajita veggies, mild tomato salsa, cheese, sour cream; no guacamole or extra toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by restaurant, portion size, ingredients, and customizations. Values based on standard Chipotle servings; check official nutrition info when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard chicken chipotle bowl has about 665 kcal and 42 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use white rice instead of brown

faqs.q: How many calories in a chicken chipotle bowl without rice?
faqs.a: Removing rice saves ~210 kcal, for a total of about 455 kcal.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a chicken chipotle bowl?
faqs.a: Approximately 42 g from the grilled chicken and beans.

faqs.q: Is a chicken chipotle bowl low-carb?
faqs.a: No, it has ~71 g carbs mainly from rice and beans; opt for no rice for lower carbs.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a chicken chipotle bowl?
faqs.a: Around 1620 mg, mostly from seasonings, salsa, and cheese.

faqs.q: Can I make a chicken chipotle bowl lower in calories?
faqs.a: Yes, skip sour cream and cheese to reduce by 150 kcal, or add more veggies for volume without extra calories.
